Hi Leroy, welsome to the list, great to have you here.

What's best depends=
 totally on what they are, who made them, state of 
polish is not as import=
ant as the state of the sword. If the 1930's 
sword has NBTHK Hozon, then i=
t will be a good smith I assume, there were 
many great smiths in the mid 1=
800's and the new swords are good also.

what have you been reading ?.

Ric=
h Turner
